lead_paragraph: Some prominent Democrats had called for the Democratic National Committee chairwoman to step down in the wake of emails revealing the party’s attempts to undermine Bernie Sanders’s presidential bid.

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman, Trip Gabriel and Yamiche Alcindor contributed reporting.
byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

headline.print_headline: Leaks Bring Down a Democratic Leader
headline.main: Debbie Wasserman Schultz to Resign D.N.C. Post

snippet: Some prominent Democrats had called for the Democratic National Committee chairwoman to step down in the wake of emails revealing the party’s attempts to undermine Bernie Sanders’s presidential bid....
abstract: Democratic National Committee chairwoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz, on eve of Democratic National Convention, abruptly resigns in wake of 20,000 leaked emails showing party officials plotting to sabotage Sen Bernie Sanders's presidential campaign; resignation, combined with pro-Sanders protests in Philadelphia, threatens healing process from bitter campaign battle between Sanders and Hillary Clinton.
